page.title: 12LOCAL FARMS
page.content: { UPPER WOODEATON AND PEGTOP FARMS}(165 acres). The owner of the farm lives in Islip. The crops are rotating wheat and grass which is used for grazing, hay and silage. The animals are beef cattle and pigs. The farm is fully mechanised with storage barns and silage clamps. { { SESCUT FARM and HOME FARM.} These are owned by St. Johns College. They are worked by a tenant farmer. There is arable land, sheep and pigs. It is fully mechanised. Sescut farm is probably mentioned in the Doomsday book. { UPPER WOODS FARM } This is about 70 acres. Mainly cattle. { { MANOR FARM (WOODEATON)} This is owner occupied. There is arable and grassland and beef cattle.
